entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backing field symbol for record with a primary constructor in a referenced project is missing #74634
  • Go to Definition doesn't work sometimes, and I have to retype the symbol to make it work #74631

PullRequests

Created

  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Offer to upgrade existing properties to use 'field'. #74629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations again in BlockStructure collection #74627
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support in DevKit for source link go to definition #74626
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Tag PRs where any file matches the specified patterns #74622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Change SyntaxEquivalence.AreEquivalent to use a more appropriate pooling mechanism for the stack it uses to walk trees. #74610
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Modify SyntaxNodeExtensions.GetMembers to instead execute a given lambda over the collection. #74628
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations during SourceText serialization #74608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Disallow span conversions between spans which are not structs #74587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Erase extension types eagerly during translation of type symbols to Cci entities. #74576
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for System.Threading.Lock #74526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
